# Libraries 

```{r}
library(forecast)
```


```{r}
arima.sim(25, model = list(ar = .5))



sim_n_reps <- function(reps, n, ar_coeffs){
  replicate(reps, 
            arima.sim(n, model = list(ar = ar_coeffs)))
}
```
